function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Loss of data security and privacy in centralized cloud storage for contact tracing data.","Impact":"Potential compromise of personal information and social interactions.","Mitigation":"Adopt decentralized storage solutions and encryption methods.","Technologies":"Blockchain, encryption methods","People":"Users of contact tracing apps","Owner":"Developers of contact tracing apps"},{"Description":"Challenges in maintaining a new working environment with social distancing and minimal physical contact.","Impact":"Risk of increased transmission of contagious diseases in the built environment.","Mitigation":"Implement smart building technologies and automation to reduce human-to-human interaction.","Technologies":"Smart building technologies, automation","People":"Factory workers, employees","Owner":"Industry leaders, factory management"},{"Description":"Disruption in the global supply chain for medical equipment and pharmaceuticals.","Impact":"Potential shortages and delays in the distribution of critical medical supplies.","Mitigation":"Implement blockchain-based supply chain management for provenance and transparency.","Technologies":"Blockchain, supply chain management systems","People":"Medical supply chain stakeholders","Owner":"Supply chain management organizations"}]}
